section.name: What our clients say ...
section.p: "I couldn't be happier with my ActiveQuant server. Its not just stable, its rock solid, easily coping with the 1500 messages a second we see in peaks. Data is quick and easy to access. The database is massively scaleable and the package doesnt have a huge hardware requirement, nor does it require you to purchase licenses from multiple vendors to run it. I looked at multiple alternatives to ActiveQuant, none could offer close to the same value proposition. Ulrich has my contact details, I'm happy to answer questions" - John F.
"We are very pleased with the ActiveQuant server application. - quality, - stability - scalability - data amount - collaboration

subsection.name: Inquiries
subsection.p: Contact us for more information: sales@activequant.com or proceed to http://www.activequant.com.
